description: "Three maps of the Caroline Islands. One shows colonised areas in Southeast Asia: Dutch East Indies; British North Borneo, British New Guinea; German New Guinea; Philippines (Spain); Portuguese Timor. The route of the Challenger expedition is marked."
title: "W. & A.K. Johnston's sheet of maps to illustrate the Caroline islands dispute between Germany and Spain. 1) Caroline islands 2) Relative position of islands to Germany & Spain 3) Spanish & German possessions in the Pacific [cartographic material]"
